text: Campnosperma zeylanicum is a species of plant in the family Anacardiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==Culture== Known as අරිද්ද (aridda) in Sinhala. ==References== zeylanicum Category:Endemic flora of Sri Lanka Category:Trees of Sri Lanka Category:Vulnerable flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Campnosperma zeylanicum
